item.source: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]

item.title: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

[quote=“minikiller, post:6, topic:327951”][quote author=Oh-Noes link=topic=424336.msg3126806#msg3126806 date=1266100417]

im not gunna go say “haha u suck!!” but dude, that code is for 508 server.

No it’s not.
If you want to remove rune requirements, just go to the method for each spell you want to change and delete your method that checks for runes. Delta users will have something like:

playerHasItem(itemID, amount)

[/quote]
on 317 it is sM not sendMessage and some of it seems like 508…[/quote]
Amazingly enough, Delta does not accomodate for the entire category of 317 servers. Lots of older sources used sendMessage, like AllStarScape. Moreover, you can’t tell what cache version a server is by looking at the method names - a person could change the name of every single one should they want to.

Read full topic
item.source: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]

item.title: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]
item.dc:creator: @minikiller minikiller
item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:4, topic:327951”][quote author=minikiller link=topic=424336.msg3126796#msg3126796 date=1266100007]
im not gunna go say “haha u suck!!” but dude, that code is for 508 server.
[/quote]
No it’s not.
If you want to remove rune requirements, just go to the method for each spell you want to change and delete your method that checks for runes. Delta users will have something like:

playerHasItem(itemID, amount)

on 317 it is sM not sendMessage and some of it seems like 508…

Read full topic
item.source: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]

item.title: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

i think that’s code from czar based servers…

anyways, to remove the spell requirements on a DELTA server, go to your server folder. then go to the config folder. open up magicSpells.cfg and there you go! all rune rquirements over there.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

minikiller:

im not gunna go say “haha u suck!!” but dude, that code is for 508 server.

No it’s not.
If you want to remove rune requirements, just go to the method for each spell you want to change and delete your method that checks for runes. Delta users will have something like:

playerHasItem(itemID, amount)

item.title: [317]how can i make it so i dont need runes for spells?[urgent]
item.dc:creator: @joscape joscape
item.description:
@joscape wrote:

go to client.java ctrl F “public void CastVengeance() {”
then look for all the other spells wich should be below it and replace with this:

public void CastVengeance() { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94 && CanVen == true) { if (Vengeance == true) { sendMessage("your a noob dont cheat with vengence"); } else if (Vengeance != true) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; startAnimation(811); stillgfx(437, absY, absX); Vengeance = true; VengeanceTimer = 360; VenTimer = 120; } else if(playerLevel[6] < 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast Vengeance!"); } } } public void IceBarrage(){ if(icebar == 0){ inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 99, 10); actionTimer = 15; icebar = 10; PkingDelay = 15; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } }

yours should have something with the requirement amount of runes vut this one doesnt so i haop this helped

Read full topic
